players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure the mafia doesn't infiltrate our ranks further."
You: "I'm shocked about Diana's death. Bob, your comment about staying vigilant makes sense, but I'm curious - do you have any specific suspicions about who might be responsible?"
Charlie: "I agree with Bob's sentiment about staying vigilant. Let's all work together to ensure the safety of our village and uncover the truth behind Diana's death."
You: "Charlie, you've been quite quiet so far. What are your thoughts on Bob's observations? Do you have any suspicions about who might be the mafioso among us?"
